translations: n．继承者，模仿者：指在某一领域中，模仿或继承前辈成就的人，但往往缺乏创新和独特性。
· The new generation of artists is often seen as epigones of the great masters.
新一代的艺术家常常被视为伟大大师的模仿者。

sentences.sentence: Is gradual, he after death came together large Numbers of epigones, big influence, let ten palace gentleman the king be all afraid of matchless.
sentences.translation: 渐渐的，他身后聚集了大批追随者，势力之大，让十殿君王都忌惮无比。

sentences.sentence: Is gradual, he after decease came together colossal Numbers of epigones, big influence, let ten palace gentleman the king be all terrified of matchless.
sentences.translation: 渐渐的，他身后聚集了大批追随者，势力之大，让十殿君王都忌惮无比。
